stories.title: States want to boycott Russian vodka. That won't work

stories.text:
https://youtu.be/yrbv40ENU_o : I have always been a fan of Tom Lehrer and he had penned so many more than the very quotable Periodic Table and New Math.

I was both delighted and saddened when I went back to listen to some more Lehrer this time around..

Also: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=frAEmhqdLFs : Tom Lehrer - We Will All Go Together When We Go

Tom Lehrer now on Public Domain and iTunes.

stories.text:
Would there be any interest in a scientific study of the effectiveness of HN flagging, including:

  - false positives
  - false negatives
  - brigading
  - flagged topics vs off-HN contexts
  - flagged topic trends over extended time
  - content origin (domain, geo, org, author)
Pointers to prior research on distributed flagging and moderation would be welcome.
stories.title: Ask HN: Scientific Study of HN flag dynamics
